revised_title: Swedish Coins and Calculation for Finding Easter
tldr: The author, Ralph Thoresby, shares information about a Swedish coin from 1679 and discusses the inscription of the Nomen Tetragranimaton of Jehovah on some of the money. Additionally, Thoresby explains the rule in the Common Prayer Books for finding the date of Easter, emphasizing that the 20th of March in Leap years is the same as the 21st of March in common years.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Numismatics
